title: Is Peter Struzok the CIA agent who grew up in Iran and was sent to the FBI to help Hillary Clinton?
subtitle: A right-wing blog with a history of spreading conspiracy theories claimed that the FBI agent was a CIA agent with foreign connections.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Agent Peter Struzok II grew up in Iran; he had a father who had been involved in covert activities abroad under the guise of doing charity work; he acted as a Middle East Intelligence Agent in Obama's administration; and the CIA agent was "placed" in the FBI to help Hillary Clinton win the presidency.
